channel.title: VCS on What, Why, How
channel.description: Recent content in VCS on What, Why, How

item.title: Git
item.description: Getting started Create a Repository Create a new local repository 1 $ git init [project name] Clone a repository 1 $ git clone git_url Clone a repository into a specified directory 1 $ git clone git_url my_directory Make a change Show modified files in working directory, staged for your next commit 1 $ git status Stages the file, ready for commit
